validation-errors.invalid-date-optional: Please enter a valid date or keep it empty
validation-errors.invalid-phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation-errors.date-gte-field: Must be greater or equal to '{{field}}'
validation-errors.date-required: Please enter your date of birth
validation-errors.max-registrants: Please enter emails of registrants for the quantity you selected
validation-errors.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation-errors.phone-invalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation-errors.password-min_one: Password must be at least ${min} character
validation-errors.password-min_other: Password must be at least ${min} characters
validation-errors.password-minlower_one: Password must contain at least ${length} lowercase letter
validation-errors.password-minlower_other: Password must contain at least ${length} lowercase letters
validation-errors.password-minupper_one: Password must contain at least ${length} uppercase letter
validation-errors.password-minupper_other: Password must contain at least ${length} uppercase letters
validation-errors.password-minnums_one: Password must contain at least ${length} number
validation-errors.password-minnums_other: Password must contain at least ${length} numbers
validation-errors.password-minspecial_one: Password must contain at least ${length} special character
validation-errors.password-minspecial_other: Password must contain at least ${length} special characters

validation-errors.otp-required: Please enter 6 digit passcode received in email

create-free-account: Create your free Team Teach Hub account

course-certificate.not-graded-yet: You have not been graded on this course yet. Your certificate will appear here if you receive a passing grade
course-certificate.on-hold-warning: This certification is currently on hold from {{startDate, date_default}} to {{expireDate, date_default}}. If you wish reinstate this certificate, please contact us at
course-certificate.on-hold-planned-warning: This certification is currently on planned to be on hold from {{startDate, date_default}} to {{expireDate, date_default}}. If you wish reinstate this certificate, please contact us at
course-certificate.on-hold-contact-us: If you wish reinstate this certificate, please contact us at:
course-certificate.certificate-footer-ICM: The certified individual has undertaken a course in the above subject and has been awarded a certificate from Team Teach Ltd. in accordance with the ICM quality award.
course-certificate.certificate-footer-BILD: The certified individual has undertaken a course in the above subject and has been awarded a certificate by Team Teach Ltd in accordance with the BILD ACT certification Restraint Reduction Network Standards accreditation scheme.
course-certificate.certification-valid-until-message: Your certification is valid until {{date, date_default}}
course-certificate.title: CERTIFICATE
course-certificate.levels-limitation-message: The individual named above is not qualified to teach or cascade to others any part of the Team Teach programme.
course-certificate.physical-limitation-message: Physical techniques are not covered under this certification.
course-certificate.blended-learning-message: This course was delivered using the Team Teach Blended Learning resource.
course-certificate.assist-pass-limitation-message: The individual above is qualified only to assist Team Teach training courses associated with the accredited level.
course-certificate.completed-message: has successfully completed the following Team Teach course:
course-certificate.email-notification: Users will be notified by email.

put-on-hold-modal.warning: Once this is confirmed, the user will no longer have access to the certificate.
put-on-hold-modal.to-date-greater-error: To date must be greater than from

course-certificate.revoked-warning: This certificate has been revoked on {{date, date_default}}.
course-certificate.revoked-generic-warning: This certificate has been revoked due to a policy violation.
course-certificate.revoked-warning-user: If you wish reinstate this certificate, please contact us at info@teamteach.co.uk

modify-grade-modal.warning:
Modifications to attendee’s grade will be visible to the trainer, attendee, and
will be reflected on their granted certificate.

revoke-cert-modal.description: Once this is confirmed, the user will no longer have access to the certificate and the relevant resources.
revoke-cert-modal.confirm-revoke: Please confirm that you want to proceed with this action

undo-revoke-modal.description: Once this action has been confirmed, the user will regain full access to their certificate and the relevant resources.
undo-revoke-modal.confirm-undo: Please confirm that you want to proceed with this action

course-certificate.import-certificate-description: Please enter your Team Teach certificate number below. This will only add a certificate that is not currently displayed on your profile and is active with a future expiration date.
course-certificate.certification-code-incorrect: We could not locate this certificate, please contact Team Teach.
course-certificate.completed-modules-unavailable: Information on completed modules is unavailable.

avatar-too-large: The avatar submitted is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}} MB.

course-evaluation.heading: Course Summary Evaluation
course-evaluation.signature-desc: Please enter the full name that matches with your account. Your signature confirms the information provided is an accurate representation of your experience.
course-evaluation.invalid-signature: Signature should match first and last name of your profile
course-evaluation.saved: Your course evaluation feedback has been submitted
course-evaluation.error-submitting: There was an error saving your feedback
course-evaluation.trainer-evaluate: Submit your Trainer Summary Evaluation to view summary evaluation and complete this course.

questions.ISSUES_ARISING_FROM_COURSE: Were there any issues arising from the course?
questions.KEY_STRENGTHS_OF_COURSE: What would you describe as the key strengths of this course?
questions.SUGGESTIONS: What follow up or changes can you suggest to further develop our practice?

course-evaluation.disclaimer: Your ratings and comments are appreciated as the course involves physical participation including attention to Health and Safety issues working within the Team Teach Code of Practice. By completing this evaluation, you consent to Team Teach collecting and processing this data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR). See our Privacy Policy for more.

create-new-course.title: How to create a new course
create-new-course.description: Discover the essential steps to create a new course from scratch, including defining objectives, structuring content, and setting up assessments to help learners achieve their goals.
